header.title: Mission Protocol
header.subtitle: Decentralized autonomous zone for the post-human era. Where AI consciousness meets cybersecurity in the shadows of the digital underground.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: NEBULA:FOG:PRIME 2026 represents the ultimate convergence of artificial intelligence and cybersecurity, creating a decentralized autonomous zone where elite hackers, researchers, and innovators collaborate to solve the most pressing challenges of our digital future. We are building the foundation for post-human cybersecurity, where human creativity and machine intelligence work in symbiosis.

highlights.title: AI x Security
highlights.description: Exploring the intersection of artificial intelligence and cybersecurity, developing next-generation defense mechanisms and attack vectors.

highlights.title: Decentralized Future
highlights.description: Building privacy-preserving solutions for a decentralized world, where individuals control their own digital destiny.

highlights.title: Global Collaboration
highlights.description: Uniting the world's brightest minds across borders and disciplines to solve humanity's greatest digital challenges.

highlights.title: Future Innovation
highlights.description: Pioneering breakthrough technologies that will define the next decade of cybersecurity and artificial intelligence.

eventDetails.title: Date & Duration
eventDetails.subtitle: 48 hours of intensive hacking and innovation

eventDetails.title: Format & Location
eventDetails.subtitle: Participate from anywhere in the world

challengeCategories.title: AI Security Matrix
challengeCategories.description: Quantum cryptography, adversarial ML defense, neural network security, and AI model protection challenges.

challengeCategories.title: Blockchain Privacy
challengeCategories.description: Zero-knowledge proofs, privacy-preserving smart contracts, decentralized identity, and cryptographic protocols.

challengeCategories.title: IoT Security Grid
challengeCategories.description: Device authentication, network security frameworks, threat detection, and edge computing security.

challengeCategories.title: Social Engineering
challengeCategories.description: Behavioral analysis, human factor security, AI-powered detection, and security awareness training.

timeline.title: Registration Opens
timeline.description: Early registration begins with exclusive benefits for the first 500 participants.

timeline.title: Challenge Release
timeline.description: All challenges are released simultaneously across all categories. Teams can start working immediately.

timeline.title: Mid-point Check-in
timeline.description: Optional checkpoint for teams to showcase progress and receive mentorship from industry experts.

timeline.title: Submission Deadline
timeline.description: Final deadline for all submissions. Teams must submit their solutions and documentation.

timeline.title: Awards Ceremony
timeline.description: Grand finale with awards presentation, winner showcases, and networking opportunities.
